verses.roman:
pūrvavat sabā lañā guṇḍicā-mārjana
ratha-āge pūrvavat karilā nartana

synonyms: pūrva-vat—as previously; sabā—all the devotees; lañā—taking; guṇḍicā-mārjana—the cleaning of the Guṇḍicā temple; ratha-āge—in front of the chariot; pūrva-vat—as previously; karilā nartana—danced.
translation: All the devotees engaged in the cleansing ceremony of the Guṇḍicā temple and danced in front of the Ratha-yātrā chariot, just as they had done in the past.
